articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Gmail makes it easier to track upcoming package deliveries - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google also announced on that it's updating the Promotion category in Gmail to allow users to sort by "most relevant" promotion emails.
articles.content: Gmail is rolling out a new “Purchases” tab that gives users a quick overview of their upcoming package deliveries, Google announced on Thursday. The tab will allow them to access all their purchase-r… [+1671 chars]

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Battle Royale Mode Gets Official Details; Testing Starts This Week on BF Labs - Wccftech
articles.description: Testing for the Battlefield 6 Battle Royale mode begins this week on Battlefield Labs. Learn all the details in our report.
articles.content: A few hours ago, the Battlefield 6 development team unveiled the long-rumored (and recently leaked) Battle Royale mode, which will begin testing this week via the Battlefield Labs platform. The goal … [+3495 chars]
